snippet: Venezuelan officials released Jim Wyss, a bureau chief for The Miami Herald, after he was detained Thursday near the Colombian border.
abstract: Miami Herald bureau chief Jim Wyss is detained for two days and then released by Venezuelan authorities without explanation.
lead_paragraph: Venezuelan officials released Jim Wyss, a bureau chief for The Miami Herald, after he was detained Thursday near the Colombian border.

headline.main: Venezuela Releases U.S. Journalist After 2 Days
headline.print_headline: Venezuela Releases U.S. Journalist After 2 Days
